column4: I am trying to get my built in SmartCard reader to work, i can see it when i run dmesg on the last line, but nothing I do get's it working. I tried editing the fstab file but still nothing
any help
Not sure, how can i find out?
does tifm_core mean anything
doesnt it have to have a file system on it? why fs is in the smart card?
do you have a memory card inserted in?
does it show when you type mount
your memory card is formatted and have a file system on it?
i assume the windows format uses that cifs  thats listed noh?
yes, i thought those were the memory cards you have
remove the memory card and see if its detected by dmesg
or look at your /var/log/messages at the end
also you need to prefix your responses with my nick if its for me, i will miss if it doesnt have
ok, weird now there is an extra line at the bottom, ill past again
http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/38306/
there you go, its detected, now plug the memory back in and see if its seen in mount assuming it has a recognizable FS on it
the mount output - http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/38307/
You still with me?
yes..i dont see it detected yet...you may have to wait for a few till your card is detected
is there any ways i can force the mount?
use the mount command
i also asked you to look at /var/log/messages  did it show anything when you plugged/unplugged the memory card?
